title: Pattern Pricking, ""La Boule de Neige"  [The Snowball]", early 20th century
inscribed: modele No. 260 de "La Boule de Neige" Le Mans - fil No. 500 - 50 fuseaux
dimensions: Length: 38 cm [15"] Direction in which the pattern would be worked. Width: 6.5 cm [2.5"] Lace sample: Length: 5.5 cm [2"] Direction worked. Width: 4 cm [1.5"]
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Robert Mertz
description: Pattern pricking with design drawn on green paper. Small sample of bobbin lace made from the pattern and sewn to the pattern.

tombstone.epitaph:
Pattern Pricking, ""La Boule de Neige"  [The Snowball]", early 20th century.
early 20th century. Medium: cardboard, paper. Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Robert Mertz. 1983-14-10.
